title: Qureshi wishes Belgian, Austrian FMs early recovery from COVID-19
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 19 (APP):Foreign Minister Shah Mehmood Qureshi on Monday wished early recovery to Belgian Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Foreign Affairs Sophie Wilmes and Austrian counterpart Alexander Schallenberg suffering from COVID-19.
To Sohie Wilmes, the foreign minister in a tweet said “my prayers and best wishes to you. I look forward to connecting with you soon and wish you a speedy recovery from COVID-19”.
Qureshi in another tweet also wished best of health to Alexander Schallenberg.
